com.facebook.buck.core.rules.graphbuilder

Class BuildRuleContextWithEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.graphbuilder.BuildRuleContextWithEnvironment

  • @Value.Immutable(builder=false,
                 copy=false,
                 prehash=false)
public abstract class BuildRuleContextWithEnvironment
extends Object
    Context information used for construction of ActionGraph in com.facebook.buck.graph.transformationengine.AsyncTransformationEngine.

    This wraps the BuildRuleCreationContext needed for constructing BuildRules with TransformationEnvironment from the com.facebook.buck.graph.transformationengine.AsyncTransformationEngine.

    Access to the TransformationEnvironment is limited to restrict access of BuildRule construction logic to BuildRules. Construction phase can only access information to dependencies via BuildRuleInfoProviders. Those dependencies not yet created will be implicitly created by this class using the wrapped TransformationEnvironment.

    This context is not part of the BuildRuleKey as TransformationEnvironment should not be part of the identifier of what BuildRule to compute.

    Instances should only be created in com.facebook.buck.graph.transformationengine.AsyncTransformer#transform(Object, TransformationEnvironment) implementation for ActionGraph construction. Hence, we have package-private implementation which hides constructor.

      • getProviderCollectionForDep

        public CompletionStage<BuildRule> getProviderCollectionForDep(BuildRuleKey depKey,
                                                              Function<BuildRuleInfoProviderCollection,BuildRule> createBuildRuleWithDep)
        A method for Action Graph construction phase to access information from a dependency by retrieving all BuildRuleInfoProviders of the dependent BuildRule.

        The result is then asynchronously given to the supplied Function, which can use the BuildRuleInfoProviders to create the current desired BuildRule.

        Parameters:
        depKey - the BuildRuleKey of the desired dependency
        createBuildRuleWithDep - the function that uses the dependencies to create the current BuildRule
        Returns:
        a future of the BuildRule to be created

      • getProviderCollectionForDeps

        public CompletionStage<BuildRule> getProviderCollectionForDeps(Iterable<BuildRuleKey> depKeys,
                                                               Function<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<BuildRuleKey,BuildRuleInfoProviderCollection>,BuildRule> createBuildRuleWithDeps)
        A method for Action Graph construction phase to access information from many dependencies by retrieving all BuildRuleInfoProviders of the dependencies BuildRule.

        The result is then asynchronously given to the supplied Function, which can use the BuildRuleInfoProviders of the dependencies as a Map to create the current desired BuildRule.

        Parameters:
        depKeys - the BuildRuleKey of the desired dependency
        createBuildRuleWithDeps - the function that uses the dependencies to create the current BuildRule
        Returns:
        a future of the BuildRule to be created
